titles.title: Police CAMERA Act of 2020
Police CAMERA Act of 2020
Police Creating Accountability by Making Effective Recording Available Act of 2020

A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to authorize a grant program to assist State and local law enforcement agencies in purchasing body-worn cameras and securely storing and maintaining recorded data for law enforcement officers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
